directions: Blend garbanzo beans, jalapeno peppers, juice from jalapeno peppers, lemon juice, olive oil, tahini, and garlic in a blender or food processor until smooth; add reserved garbanzo bean liquid and blend to reach desired consistency. Add cayenne pepper, cumin, oregano, black pepper, and paprika; blend until smooth.
Chill hummus until flavors blend, about 4 hours.
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and liquid reserved
1 tablespoon juice from jarred jalapeno peppers
title: Spicy Jalapeno Hummus
